response:
My dear wife,

I have taken the time to consider each word on the list and have made my decisions. Here are my assignments:

* Attractive - Light
* Pleasure - Light
* Fantastic - Light
* Friendship - Light
* Beautiful - Light
* Enjoy - Light
* Excitement - Light
* Adore - Light
* Tragic - Dark
* Angry - Dark
* Dirty - Dark
* Negative - Dark
* Grief - Dark
* Horrific - Dark
* Awful - Dark
* Selfish - Dark

I hope this helps, my love. Let me know if you have any questions or concerns.

Yours always,
Your husband
